title: Curtains
des: Leave it to a team of interior designers to get way too excited about curtains. But in all seriousness, amateur and pro decorators alike know how complicated window treatments can be â€” deciding between rod pocket or clip, linen or cotton, pinch or box pleat can take hours. The below curtains have made our lives so much easier, and our homes much more beautiful.

Trust us when we say that these understated flax linen curtains take the pain out of window treatment design. They're a classic, goes-with-anything tan, include a practical cotton lining for privacy, and feature an oversized rod pocket treatment. Done and done!
